creditline: Gift of Vanessa Laird and Timothy Raylor
description: beaded sash with grey, tan and purple braided and knotted fringe at each end; white ground with alternating blue and yellow eight-pointed stars separated by stylized stems with round "flowers/leaves" in either brown and green or green and purple; amber-colored beads border each star; pink rectangular border over entire design; received framed
title: Sash
